mapper.select: select * from QUES_ANS where ANSWER is null
select * from QUES_ANS where ANSWER is not null
mapper.insert: insert into QUES_ANS (READERID, ASKDATE, QUESTION) values (#{readerId},#{askDate},#{question})
mapper.delete: delete QUES_ANS where READERID = #{readerId} and ASKDATE = #{askDate}
mapper.update: update LYN.QUES_ANS set ANSWER = #{answer},JOBID = #{jobId} where READERID=#{readerId} and ASKDATE = #{askDate}
